Title: Taking a Break from All Your Worries
Plot: Now onboard Galactica, Baltar faces charges of treason. He contemplates suicide with the help of Number Six. Questions remain about his true identity. Is he a Cylon or isn't he?Apollo shows off the new drinking establishment on Galactica, Joe's Bar, to Tyrol. Apollo thinks about Kara and wonders whether his marriage to Dee is worth saving.
GuestStars: Tom Bower, Steve Lawlor, Graeme Duffy, Jason Bryden, Kandyse McClure, Donnelly Rhodes, Alessandro Juliani
